subject: Baseball
Airlines and Airplanes
lead_paragraph: Cory Lidle had a new hobby, a new pursuit, a new calling. He was learning how to fly, and with a ballplayer salary, he could afford to act on his impulse.
snippet: Cory Lidle had a new hobby, a new pursuit, a new calling. He was learning how to fly, and with a ballplayer salary, he could afford to act on his impulse.
